title: The LOOK on his face! Rep. Doug Collins just RIPS into Jerry Nadler and Dems during today’s oversight hearing and DAMN son (watch)
text:
We’ve been writing more and more about Representative Doug Collins, mainly because he’s a constant thorn in Jerry Nadler’s side when it comes to impeaching Trump. Or making a big show about trying to impeach Trump to appease the Liberal base.

Because that’s what Collins points out, this is all really just a show and that the committee doesn’t ever do anything but talk. And issue a bunch of subpoenas, apparently …

Watch.

In the absence of a proper floor vote to authorize an impeachment inquiry, today’s business represents a regular oversight hearing, masquerading as impeachment to appease a liberal base. pic.twitter.com/RfmPO2C4F6 — Rep. Doug Collins (@RepDougCollins) September 17, 2019

See what we mean?

Note, his polite, southern drawl makes it even better.

We love the looks on the faces on the guys behind him … you can tell they’re trying not to laugh.

And speaking of looks on faces, Jerry Nadler is FURIOUS.

They even fake impeachment — Veronica Birkenstock (@vtbirkenstock) September 17, 2019

Anything to keep their base enraged and hopeful because Democrats know they don’t have much else to run on.

Yup.

Democrats are nothing but scammers. The American people are figuring that out. 🇺🇸💪 — Jim Stone (@kssjvs) September 17, 2019

Dems: in one ear and out the other. — The Outraged Ohioan 🇰🇾🇱🇧🇺🇸 (@HitMWithThaHein) September 17, 2019

Keep it going…this democrat debacle is comedy gold!!! pic.twitter.com/kJ6TXnPCd2 — 🐝Operation Boomerang is Coming🐝 (@HornetStings) September 17, 2019

Hey, at least Collins keeps it entertaining, right?

Related:

What a CROWD (ha)! Rashida Tlaib gets all big and bad with GM in a tweet but her ‘protest video’ paints a VERY different picture

Class is in session: Conservatives SCHOOL blue-check pastor and his list of ‘lessons Trump supporters are teaching their kids’

THRASHED: Mollie Hemingway’s dig at WaPo’s Aaron Blake over his Christine Blasey Ford/Leland Keyser piece is a work of ART
description: But tell us how you really feel, Doug.
